name: Galaxy Geomatics
description: expertise in the field of Land Surveyin
overview:
Introduction: GALAXY GEOMATICS PVT. LTD. was established in 2008 with an expertise in the field of Land Surveying in an efficient way. We are engaged in Land Survey Engineering Services and educational training for the core students creating awareness among the students/trainee.

Our Services: Topographical Survey Roads and Bridges Pipeline Survey Power Transmission Line Survey Boundary Survey Estimation of Earth Quantities

Our Mission: Our mission is to build a strong, viable and long term relationship with our customer, by providing excellent service conforming to international standards in a short span of time.

Our Vision: Our Vision is to be an exemplary leader in Dubai providing quality service to all our esteemed clients.

Values: We uphold the values of mutual respect, unwavering integrity, responsive teamwork and selfless service.

Our Team: We are blessed with the team of highly knowledgeable and skilled professionals that are very much competent to enhance the effectiveness and quality of our products. They pay attention to effective market research to comprehend client’s demands and to choose suitable vendors. All our professionals work under the supervision of our experienced management members who carry years of experience and are fully aware of existing market trends.

Why Us?

Following high-degree professionalism, ethical practices and proper management, we have established strong position in the industry. All our efforts and hard work are directly or indirectly related to the customer satisfaction and retention. Our quality-assured products are offered within the committed time frame and our services are performed keeping in mind the direct demands of our clients.

offices.address1: No. 10 - 2 - 300/A/2, Nukkula Arcade, Above Canara Bank, Near To
